name: Central Laboratory Ruins
title: Fontaine Research Institute: Central Laboratory Ruins
desc: ...When excess intelligence and passion came together, research brought about results in a manner that surpassed everyone's expectations. Now, however, there remains no one to applaud that achievement.\nWhen an ideal is destroyed, its most important responsibility is to hold its peace...

skills.desc: After you Discard or use 1 card for Tune: This card gains 1 Experimental Progress point. Whenever you reach 3, 6, and 9 points, you will gain 1 Omni Element. After that, if Experimental Progress is at least 9, discard this card.
